force_include.hpp

00001 #ifndef BOOST_SERIALIZATION_FORCE_INCLUDE_HPP
00002 #define BOOST_SERIALIZATION_FORCE_INCLUDE_HPP
00003 
00004 // MS compatible compilers support #pragma once
00005 #if defined(_MSC_VER) && (_MSC_VER >= 1020)
00006 # pragma once
00007 #endif
00008 
00010 // force_include.hpp:
00011 
00012 // (C) Copyright 2002 Robert Ramey - http://www.rrsd.com . 
00013 // Use, modification and distribution is subject to the Boost Software
00014 // License, Version 1.0. (See accompanying file LICENSE_1_0.txt or copy at
00015 // http://www.boost.org/LICENSE_1_0.txt)
00016 
00017 //  See http://www.boost.org for updates, documentation, and revision history.
00018 
00019 #include <boost/config.hpp>
00020 
00021 // the following help macro is to guarentee that certain coded
00022 // is not removed by over-eager linker optimiser.  In certain cases
00023 // we create static objects must be created but are actually never
00024 // referenced - creation has a side-effect such as global registration
00025 // which is important to us. We make an effort to refer these objects
00026 // so that a smart linker won't remove them as being unreferenced.
00027 // In microsoft compilers, inlining the code that does the referring
00028 // means the code gets lost and the static object is not included
00029 // in the library and hence never registered.  This manifests itself
00030 // in an ungraceful crash at runtime when (and only when) built in
00031 // release mode.
00032 
00033 #if defined(BOOST_HAS_DECLSPEC) && !defined(__COMO__)
00034 #   if defined(__BORLANDC__)
00035 #       define BOOST_DLLEXPORT __export
00036 #   else
00037 #       define BOOST_DLLEXPORT __declspec(dllexport)
00038 #   endif
00039 #elif ! defined(_WIN32) && ! defined(_WIN64)
00040 #   if defined(__MWERKS__)
00041 #       define BOOST_DLLEXPORT __declspec(dllexport)
00042 #   elif defined(__GNUC__) && (__GNUC__ >= 3)
00043 #       define BOOST_USED __attribute__ ((used))
00044 #   elif defined(__INTEL_COMPILER) && (BOOST_INTEL_CXX_VERSION >= 800)
00045 #       define BOOST_USED __attribute__ ((used))
00046 #   endif
00047 #endif
00048 
00049 #ifndef BOOST_USED
00050 #    define BOOST_USED
00051 #endif
00052 
00053 #ifndef BOOST_DLLEXPORT
00054 #    define BOOST_DLLEXPORT
00055 #endif
00056 
00057 #endif // BOOST_SERIALIZATION_FORCE_INCLUDE_HPP
